, The Headquarters of DRDO]] The 'Defence Research and Development Organisation'
('DRDO') is an agency of the Republic of India, responsible for the development
of technology for use by the military, headquartered in New Delhi, India. It was
formed in 1958 by the merger of the Technical Development Establishment and the
Directorate of Technical Development and Production with the Defence Science
Organisation.

DRDO has a network of 52 laboratories which are engaged in developing defence
technologies covering various fields, like aeronautics, armaments, electronic
and computer sciences, human resource development, life sciences, materials,
missiles, combat vehicles development and naval research and development. The
organization includes more than 5,000 scientists and about 25,000 other
scientific, technical and supporting personnel.
categories: Executive branch of the Indian government
